ATTilla/Luzbel.

Attilla and Luzbel saw Razorclaw ran towards them. "Firelaucher 
strategie"said Luzbel.

The trasmetal dragons spat their fire against Razorclaws


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Razor Claw saw the door closeing in front of him. The wolverine 
leapt
> forward landing feet first against the door and used his momentum 
to push
> off back towards the Predacons. he held his claws to the side 
intending to
> slash the dragons as he went by.
> 
> Bullet saw the maneuver, "What in the world is he doing?" he 
thought. Seeing
> the raptor change direction the bull dropped onto his stomach 
causing him to
> slide across the floor.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <airly2000@y...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Thursday, November 08, 2001 8:26 PM
> Subject: Re: showdown at the OK hallway.

behind

Predacons

> > > Razor Claw roared as the second dragon bit down. There was 
still a

> > wolverine form and dove away from the jaws of death. His speed 
would
> > keep the Predacons away but his wounds were slowly healing and he 
was
> > still loseing energeon.
> > >

slipped
> > loose. the bull gave the mutant a quick smile and dashed after the
> > wolverine.

have a

both

horns

raptor
> > would last. The

> > >         > the halls
> > >         > > (Almost reminds me of my divorce.) The raptor had 
sized
> > up the
> > >         > dragons and
> > >         > > knew that to win he'd have to fight up close so that
> > weapons other
> > >         > than body
> > >         > > parts would be ineffective. He'd anticipated that 
the

> > >         > > lead with thier teeth he just underestimated thier

the
